Hymn.Arabic: " 35- و في الصبح باكرا جدا قام و خرج و مضى الى موضع خلاء و كان يصلي هناك.
Hymn.English: 35 Now in the morning, having risen a long while before daylight, He went out and departed to a solitary place; and there He prayed.
36 And Simon and those who were with Him searched for Him.

Hymn.Arabic: 37- و لما وجدوه قالوا له ان الجميع يطلبونك.
Hymn.English: 37 When they found Him, they said to Him, Everyone is looking for You.

Hymn.Arabic: 38- فقال لهم لنذهب الى القرى المجاورة لاكرز هناك ايضا لاني لهذا خرجت.
Hymn.English: 38 But He said to them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also, because for this purpose I have come forth.

Hymn.Arabic: 39- فكان يكرز في مجامعهم في كل الجليل و يخرج الشياطين  "
Hymn.English: 39 And He was preaching in their synagogues throughout all Galilee, and casting out demons.
